name: One Light (Chowdog)
description:
A small game made for GMTK game jam in only 48 hours.

The dungeon is dark, but good thing you know this ONE and ONLY lighting spell!!

Mouse - control the light to navigate the dark dungeon

WASD - to move your character

Use your ONLY light source to stun the enemy

Have fun in the dark with your ONLY spell :)
